node.html:
Develop a solution design for FinOps, to bring cost optimization of public cloud (Google Cloud) uses in Organization.

Estimated the effort required to build business requirements by identifying the technical works.

Led feature teams to deliver projects according to the estimated time, regardless of the dependency.

Mentored development team to achieve their goals.

Built processes and checklists to help reduce the issues in production by 70%. The process is key to success.

Re-built a customer journey that helps customers to share 50% less information and get the quote quicker. It is the best in this product line in the market.

Built a feature toggle solution using AST technique and Node Js Stream, helped team to deliver multiple features parallelly from a single codebase. It makes the delivery 40% faster by reducing problems of the feature branch. For more info: https://sanjaypanda.com/blogs/feature-toggles-ideas-and-uses/

Build a compression algorithm to reduce the Automation testing execution time by 60% using Cypress.io. A significant improvement to our CI/CD process and delivery.

Awarded “The innovator” for building intelligent solutions for challenges

Built Single Page applications that run in Web, Mobile App, Tablet App.

Built a Single Page Application boilerplate with the latest Tools (React, Redux, Webpack, and organization-wide used tools and DevOps tools for CI/CD), boilerplate helps new development faster by 2 Sprint (2 weeks/sprint).

Conceptualize a porting mechanism that allowed Cypress to run in Selenium hance cross-browser.

• Built an Inventory management system within build analytics dashboard using PHP, MySQL, CakePHP2, JavaScript, Bootstrap 2.
  • Built updated analytics platform using Redis caching mechanism to faster data loading, with consistent data in place. It was a huge selling point for client.
  • Build a Cordova (PhoneGap) mobile application for regional spiritual songs for both Android and IOS.
  • Build a background data processing and API execution mechanism library using PHP, also contributed to Open Source in GitHub (34 Start, 25 Fork). For more details: https://github.com/pandasanjay/php-script-background-processer

• Built a product and price comparison application which helps customers to find the best product with the best price. Application built on PHP, MySQl, JavaScript, Angular, CSS, HTML.
  • Built web crawling tool which collect the product info (Link, Description, Images, Price) and store as e-commerce website basis. which help to update the price automatically.

• Built and maintained e-commerce application for US based company. using OPENCART, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL.
  • Built an Redmine dashboard in-house application for batter issue tracking.
  • Buit applications of product website, e-commerce, Art Glary for small business which help them build their online presence.
